text: o grantha prajalara! Pravaktalu ravatam, agi poyina konta kalam taruvata, miku anta spastanga telupataniki, vastavanga ma sandesaharudu (muham'mad) mi vaddaku vaccadu. Miru: "Ma vaddaku subhavartalu vinipincevadu mariyu heccarikalu cesevadu evvadu raledu." Ani anakudadani. Nis'sandehanga ippudu miku subhavartalu vinipincevadu mariyu heccarikalu cesevadu vacci vunnadu. Mariyu allah pratidi ceyagala samarthudu
